title: Opposition questions Sarath Weerasekara using Zahran’s V8
body_lines: SJB MP Harin Fernando questioned as to how former Minister of Public Security Sarath Weerasekara was using the V8 luxury vehicle used by suicide bomber Zahran Hashim who led the Easter Sunday Attacks.
He questioned as to how a vehicle which was kept as a court production, be used by a minister.
"Defense Secretary confirmed that the vehicle had been attached to STF," Weerasekara said.
